text:
Stay at the Luxury Bahia Principe Akumal Don Pablo Collection RIVIERA MAYA, MEXICO
Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts would like to invite you on a 3-night/4 day press trip to the Luxury Bahia Principe Akumal in Riviera Maya October 5 – 8, 2015. The 630-room all-inclusive resort has been recently renovated and has now become part of their luxury Don Pablo Collection. Situated in Riviera Maya (about one hour drive south from Cancun International Airport) you will have the opportunity to experience the distinct style, exceptional service and relaxed comfort of Bahia Hotels & Resorts while in a tropical paradise. Italian, seafood, local and international cuisine will tempt your palate at the various restaurants featured at the resort. Sip a cool drink at the many bars throughout the resort while participating in a variety of land and water activities.
Luxury Bahia Principe Akumal is one of four resorts in the Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts’ Riviera Maya complex. During our stay we will also tour the Grand Bahia Principe Coba, Grand Bahia Principe Tulum and the Luxury Bahia Principe Sian Ka’an. You will also have the opportunity to learn about Bahia Principe’s newest resort in Mexico planned to open in 2016 – the Luxury Bahia Principe Punta Jade Don Pablo Collection.
Discover what distinguishes Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts from other all-inclusive chains while experiencing first-hand the resort’s key differences. There will also be opportunities to visit nearby attractions .
Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts will provide the following: return airfare (economy), accommodation (each journalist has own room), meals/drinks included in the all-inclusive package, airport transfers to and from Cancun International airport, activities at the resort included inall-inclusive packages and any organized tours outside the resort.
Journalists are responsible for any personal expenses, costs for non-scheduled activities/transportation and travel insurance. Journalist agrees to participate in all scheduled activities. This press trip will be limited to 5 journalists. A Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts escort from its PR firm, VoX International, will be with the group throughout the trip.
Source:- Bahia Principe Hotels
